title: Instant Poha cereal Powder Recipe, Protein powder for Babies
content:
Healthy and homemade poha cereal for your babies which is high in protein and carb. It helps in weight gaining in babies.

 

This recipe is a healthy protein cereal mix for baby. It has poha and roasted gram dal which helps in weight gaining in babies. Poha cereal is rich in protein and carb. You can feed this to babies above 7 months.

 

Poha Cereal Powder - Poha & Gram Dal Health Mix Powder - Protein Powder for Babies

 

Prep time

5 mins

 

Cook time

10 mins

 

Total time

15 mins

 

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1.5 cup

 

Ingredients

For Cereal Powder:

Red Rice Poha / Aval - 1 cup

Roasted Gram Dal / Pottu Kadalai - ½ cup

 

For Porridge:

Poha Cereal Powder - 2 tablespoon

Water - ½ cup

Salt to taste

Ghee - 1 tsp

 

Instructions

Take poha in a dry pan and roast till golden. Take it in a blender.

Roast gram dal till golden. Add it to a blender.

Powder fine.

Store in an airtight container.

Now make the porridge, take some powder in a saucepan, add water and cook till it thickens.

Add salt and ghee and mix well.

Feed your baby.
